title: Audiophile
description: I developed an Audiophile ecommerce web app using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React. The platform offers a wide range of high-quality audio products for enthusiasts. Implementing user-friendly features and a seamless checkout process, the app improved customer satisfaction and conversion rates, leading to increased sales and user engagement.

title: Dictionary
description: I created a dictionary web app with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, providing access to 150,000+ words. The app includes audio pronunciation and guides, improving language learning and boosting user engagement.

title: Countries Application
description: I created a countries app using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React. This app enables users to search for countries and view detailed information such as population, capital, and currency. With a user-friendly interface and interactive features, it provides an engaging experience for exploring countries around the world.

title: GitHub User Finder
description: I developed a GitHub user finder app using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React. The app allows users to search for GitHub profiles and view repositories. With a user-friendly interface and real-time search, it simplifies the discovery of GitHub users and their work.
